thread.title: Deregulation and innovation will extend the bull market run, says Greg Powell

title: Deregulation and innovation will extend the bull market run, says Greg Powell
text:
Deregulation and innovation will extend the bull market run, says Greg Powell 3:02pm EDT - 05:26
Fi Plan Partners' CEO and author of ''Better, Richer, Fuller'' also tells Reuters' Fred Katayama his top tip for those planning for their financial future. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
